props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value of the pin inputs when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its checked state.

props.name: dir
props.description:
The reading direction of the combobox when applicable.
If omitted, inherits globally from `AConfigProvider` or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the pin input

props.name: mask
props.description: When `true`, pin inputs will be treated as password.

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The controlled checked state of the pin input. Can be binded as `v-model`.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the field. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

props.name: otp
props.description: When `true`, mobile devices will autodetect the OTP from messages or clipboard, and enable the autocomplete field.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: The placeholder character to use for empty pin-inputs.

props.name: required
props.description: When `true`, indicates that the user must set the value before the owning form can be submitted.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event handler called when the value changes.
